article:
'Biochemists' are scientists trained in biochemistry. Typical biochemists study
chemical processes and chemical transformations in living organisms. The word
"biochemist" is a portmanteau of "biological chemist".

Biochemist also research how certain chemical reactions happen in cells and
tissues and observe and record the effects of products as in food additives and
medicines. Biochemist main function is to focus on improving the qualities of
lives. 

Biochemist researchers focus on planning and conducting research experiments,
main for developing new products and updating existing products and analyzing
said products. It is also the responsibility of a biochemist to present their
research findings and create grant proposals to obtain funds for future
research.
